title: Database for Modal Construction
description: From 3D arrays to objects and arrays, I've finally decided to unify them into one database framework.

name.description: Names of each modal item that will be used for display. Use `name2` for making alternative names.

name2.description: Mostly used for making alternative names such as using original names for custom designs.

id.description:
Unique ids for each of the modal items.
https://www.w3docs.com/snippets/html/how-to-create-an-anchor-link-to-jump-to-a-specific-part-of-a-page.html

img.description: File paths for fetching the display images for each of the modal items.

nso_url.description: url that sends the user to my Happy Home Network showcase/profile page.
